post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
Hi All......
Some of Comm One members went to Sun One Tech Day on Jan 7th and 8th. I like to share the information I had heard.
Agenda ------- - Sun One Tech Day by Thomas and others - break - Attitude and Behaviour by Thomas - break - Assertive Training by Thomas if time permits
*Note : after seminar topic - Workshop
Date and Time : Jan 18th, Sat 7:00 pm Place : Thomas' residence
Hopefully see you all
Names ------ Thomas Lee Spencer Hwang 이성기 홍영기 김민 Andrew Sheen(I might be late a little bit..) Travis Choi 이계영(실수로 comment에다 이름을 넣었군요)
post.title: Sun One Tech Day
